item.title: CVE-2024-0669|2024-08-01T18:11:35.710Z -- plone%20cms -- plone%20cms
item.description: A Cross-Frame Scripting vulnerability has been found on Plone CMS affecting verssion below 6.0.5. An attacker could store a malicious URL to be opened by an administrator and execute a malicios iframe element.
